text: Yang Wenji (; born 24 September 1993) is a Chinese footballer who currently plays for Meizhou Hakka in the China League One. == Club career == Yang joined China League Two club Hebei Zhongji in 2011. He played as a substitute player in the club, following Hebei to promote to China League One in 2014. He made 13 appearances in the 2015 season as Hebei finished runners-up of the league and promoted to the Chinese Super League.
